explains: adj. （人）贫困的；（环境）贫穷的；需要关注的，需要情感支持的
wordGroup: needy student 家庭经济困难的学生

sentences.en: It's a charity that provides help for needy children.
sentences.cn: 是慈善机构为贫困孩子提供帮助。

sentences.en: There will be efforts to get larger amounts of food to the needy.
sentences.cn: 将努力把更多的食品送给穷人。

sentences.en: Silber says the tax rollback would decimate basic services for the needy.
sentences.cn: 西尔伯说税收的回落可能导致大幅缩减为贫困人口提供的基本服务。
